scripts.db:init: docker-compose exec backend flask --app backend/manage.py db init
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec backend flask --app backend/manage.py db migrate -m "Auto migration"
scripts.db:upgrade: docker-compose exec backend flask --app backend/manage.py db upgrade
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:clear && npm run db:upgrade && npm run db:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
